description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Weapon

Standard

+11 vs AC; 2d6+5 damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Weapon

Standard

+11 vs AC; 2d4+5 damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Weapon

Standard

Ranged 5/10

+11 vs AC; 2d4+5 damage.

At-Will ✦ Weapon

Standard

Gaunt makes a short sword attack and a dagger attack (melee or ranged), and he shifts 1 square after each attack.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Weapon

Immediate Interrupt

Trigger: When hit or missed by a melee attack, recharge

Targets the triggering attacker; +13 vs AC; 3d6+4 damage, and the target grants combat advantage until the end of Gaunt's next turn.

Encounter ✦ Weapon

Standard

+11 vs AC; 2d6+5 damage, and the target is slowed and grants combat advantage (save ends both), and it slides 2 squares.

At-Will ✦ Weapon

Standard

Area burst 1 within 10

+8 vs Fortitude; the target treats all nonadjacent squares as lightly obscured until the end of Gaunt's next turn. This attack doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

Encounter

Move

Gaunt ends any marked condition currently affecting him, and he shifts 6 squares.
Gaunt deals 2d6 extra damage when he hits a creature he has combat advantage against.
Gaunt can draw an item as part of the same action required to use that item.

system.biography:
HP 136; Bloodied 68Init +9 | AP 1 | Save +2
AC 21Fort 17Ref 19Will 18 ; +2 to all defenses against opportunity attacks
Speed 6
Ability ScoresStr 15 (+5)
Con 12 (+4)		Dex 19 (+7)
Int 15 (+5)		Wis 17 (+6)
Cha 15 (+5)
Languages Chondathan, Common, Dwarven, Elven, Goblin
Alignment Unaligned
Skills Bluff +10, Diplomacy +10, Endurance +9, History +10, Insight +11, Thievery +12Senses
Passive Perception 16 | Insight 21

Equipment 3 blinding bombs, dagger , leather armor , short sword .
